basic.Peptide Name: Venom antimicrobial peptide-6 (Meucin-13; NDBP-5; Arthropods, animals)
basic.Target Organism: [Ref.19088182]Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus sp. DM-1 (MIC=2 µM), Micrococcus luteus (MIC=2.9 µM), Bacillus megaterium (MIC=0.25 µM);Gram-negative bacteria:Agrobacterium tumefaciens (MIC=11.8 µM), Escherichia coli (MIC=7.90 µM), Shewanella oneidensis (MIC=6.20 µM), Stenotrophomonus sp. YC-1 (MIC=6.20 µM);Fungi:Beauveria spp. (MIC=14.1 µM), Neurospora crassa (MIC=18.3 µM), Candida albicans (MIC=42.8 µM), Saccharomyces cerevisiae (MIC=18.3 µM).
